about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello! I'm Nurullah Gündoğdu. I'm a software developer working passionately in software development. While coding, I prioritize not just functionality, but also aesthetics and user experience. I closely follow modern technologies and aim to push myself one step further in every project. Creating simple yet powerful solutions that make a difference in the digital world is not just a job for me, but also a way of life.
